summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. Cosmetics' Halo Glow Liquid Filter is available in multiple shades to suit a wide range of skin tones and undertones. The unique formula enhances the overall look of skin while imparting a soft-focus radiance.
details: DetailsBenefitsMulti-purpose, liquid glow booster gives your complexion a soft-focus social filter effect IRLGlowy makeup & skincare hybrid for dewy skinComplexion looks healthy & more radiantCan be worn 4 ways: alone, over or under makeup, mixed with foundation, or as a highlighterGreat for:‚ÄØdry, oily & combination skinAvailable in a wide range of flexible shades for even more skin tones & undertonesGlass container is recyclablee.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETAe.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA & manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities; look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. productKey IngredientsSqualane moisturizes skinHyaluronic acid hydrates skinFinely milled powders blur lines & pores for a smoother, soft-focus lookFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2604924How To Use4 Ways to Customize Your GlowWear alone for sheer coverage & a light-filtered glow. Use the bottom of the e.l.f. Angled Silicone Face Sponge to blend.Wear under foundation as a luminous base Use the e.l.f. Complexion Duo Brush to softly buff all over face.Highlight high points to capture and reflect light. Use the e.l.f. Flawless Concealer Brush to precisely apply to the high points of the face.Mix with foundation to add a beautiful dewy glow. Use the e.l.f. Ultimate Blending Brush to mix with your fave e.l.f. foundation.All sponges and brushes sold separately.Ingredients3 Light/Medium: Water (Aqua), Hydrogenated Didecene, Squalane, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Isoamyl Laurate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Tin Oxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Red Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Black Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163).
how_to_use: 4 Ways to Customize Your GlowWear alone for sheer coverage & a light-filtered glow. Use the bottom of the e.l.f. Angled Silicone Face Sponge to blend.Wear under foundation as a luminous base Use the e.l.f. Complexion Duo Brush to softly buff all over face.Highlight high points to capture and reflect light. Use the e.l.f. Flawless Concealer Brush to precisely apply to the high points of the face.Mix with foundation to add a beautiful dewy glow. Use the e.l.f. Ultimate Blending Brush to mix with your fave e.l.f. foundation.All sponges and brushes sold separately.

reviews.headline: Best Ive ever tried
reviews.comments: This us exactly HALO GLOW!! Not greasy ir oily looking...just perfect. I can even skip thr primer (although its even better with one!!) I LOVE IT!!!

reviews.headline: So Glowy!!
reviews.comments: The ELF halo glow is so easy to use. I really only put a couple of drops for a more light coverage look but everyone always says that I am glowing! Def recommend!

reviews.headline: Better for a younger person
reviews.comments: I'm 68 and I was looking for something light to use as a foundation. This is a nice product, but it did not work for me.  It would be better for someone who is younger and has less wear and tear on their face. If you just want that quick sun-kissed look for your face and you don't have dark circles or flaws to cover, then this would be the perfect foundation for you.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It did what it promises. Great foundation for a great price.

reviews.headline: Perfect for natural base or under foundation
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product! It is buildable and very glowy. I use it every day and it works great! The product may look like it runs a little orange but once it is blended out, you get a tanned and glowy look. It is very bendable and you can easily layer products on it with no difficulties!!

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I didn't care for it at all.  makes me look all glossy.  just not my cup of tea.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I love this product so much. It is a five out of five. I would recommend to buy these. I'm literally through my third bottle of one week. OMG I love this product.

reviews.headline: Good product but not for oily skin
reviews.comments: This a good product with a very nice formula, however I have oily skin which it tends to melt off of no matter how much primer and setting powder I put on. Not the fault of the product, still a very nice product and I like how it looks on me.

reviews.headline: Extremely Affordable
reviews.comments: This product is light and great under makeup or on its own. The shades do run slightly dark, so I recommend getting a shade lighter than you think. I wish there was more shades than just the ones they have. You get a good amount of product for the price point. Only con is it does seem to make me break out more than usual.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I just bought a third bottle. Idc if its not foundation but thats how i use and it makes my skin feel and look so good

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love it. The color online is the color you get I guess the shade match and it was perfect.

reviews.headline: So many breakouts
reviews.comments: Unfortunately this product did not work for me. Even the lightest shade pulls super orange on my fair skin, and even when I apply foundation or concealer on top, it just doesn't quite look right. I also feel like it accentuated any texture or lines on my skin. Lastly, it broke me out and I am throwing it away. I wanted to try giving this a few more tries to see if I can get it to work for me in any way, but every time I wear it I have a ton of whiteheads.

reviews.headline: FINALLY.....
reviews.comments: The glow is awesome and FINALLY someone comes out with an olive base shade!!!!  Leave it to ELF once again =)

reviews.headline: Break out
reviews.comments: Made me break out after 1 use.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: it has great coverage while showing skin.you will get so glowy  because of this

reviews.headline: A NEW LIGHTEST SHADE!!
reviews.comments:
Im so happy that elf FINALLY listened to the pale girls!

Im naturally very pale, my perfect match of foundation is the haus labs foundation in the lightest color (i think its 015?), and this new shade (00 fair) works wonders.

I had to throw my old one out a while ago because it had expired and was way too orange for someone of my shade. But now i have a shade that melts into my skin perfectly, giving that glow everyone raves over!

Overall, thank you for expanding the shade range. We needed it!

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: The shades are a little off in my opinion, i have light skin with warm undertones and noticed some of the undertones are "neutral warm" i would usually go with light/warm but thats not an option. The light/ neutral warm looked too orange on me so i went with fair neutral warm and its a good match besides that i love how it subtly blurs my pores and gives me such a natural glow without looking oily

reviews.headline: THIS IS THE GLOWIEST FREKING FOUNDATION EVERRR
reviews.comments: Such a glowy foundation. I feel like a diva and it doesn't even look cakey. Love this product, also a great price!!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: My daughter recommended this to me, as she has gorgeous, blemish-free skin and doesn't use foundation but likes to add a little glow to her face. She suggested this would be good for when I dont feel like {or have time to} do a full face of makeup. It's so light and gives barely enough coverage so that I notice a difference but everyone else just thinks it's my skin. Great for summertime, too!

reviews.headline: Glow filter
reviews.comments: I've been using it for 2 years, it's never a let down!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I love how radiant my face looks. I wore it alone with a bit of concealer and I'm in love. It has enough pigment almost like a cc cream but a lot more dewy. It does feel extremely hydrating on your skin. If you have oily skin, I would pair it up with a matte primer or foundation to balance it out. I have really dry skin so, this worked out for me perfectly. Definitely a must have if you love that summer time glow all year round.
faceoff_positive.headline: My skin is looking like SILK

faceoff_negative.comments: I have acne prone skin. I was really excited to use this because I couldn't use the CT one due pore cloggers. I am OCD about checking ingredients and checked the ingredients multiple time before placing an order as I had time because they were sold out of their first round. I placed my order for 2 shades just incase. It was taking long to ship and I kept checking the app on my order status, something told me to check the reviews again as more people were using it. I noticed people complaining that they broke out and others saying it had Bismuth (a pore clogger). I rechecked the ingredients and sure enough it had bismuth in it as the last ingredient! Now I know I wasn't going crazy because I checked it multiple times, I tried to cancel my order and sent an email. Minutes after my email I get a email confirming that my order has shipped, but sadly I knew I was not going to be able to use this product now. I called ELF the next day and they told me that it was a new product and there was no way the ingredients had changed and they couldn't cancel my order because it shipped, I told her I checked this multiple times but I never took a screenshot and had no proof. I happened to stroll on TikTok and saw someone posting the ingredients as they were comparing it to CT and sure enough I was not crazy! ELF why change the ingredients so fast? They did refund my money for both so thank you for that! Hoping they will remove the bismuth and be more cautious about pore clogging ingredients for us acne prone people.
faceoff_negative.headline: Didn't get to use it they changed ingredients
